definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Spa resorts have continued to develop through SE Asia. The market is increasingly competitive.
sentences.chinese: 水療度假設施在東南亞不斷髮展，市場競爭日趨激烈。

sentences.english: Gracie was even treated to a day of spa treatments the day before the party.
sentences.chinese: 而在宴會前一天，小格雷西還做了一天的水療。

sentences.english: The hotel gave us 2x 800baht vouchers to use there.
sentences.chinese: 酒店給了我們兩張800泰銖的水療代金券。

sentences.english: She prefers the ambience at Spa House.
sentences.chinese: 她較喜歡新水療池的環境。

sentences.english: The hotel offers an on-site spa as well as fine dining options.
sentences.chinese: 酒店提供了一個現場水療中心，以及精細的餐飲選項。

sentences.english: When you get colon hydrotherapy there is a chance that you might take up too much water.
sentences.chinese: 當你得到腸道水療有機會，您可能會佔用太多的水。

sentences.english: The spa was wonderful and it was perfect for what I was looking for.
sentences.chinese: 那裏的水療按摩也非常的棒完全符合我的要求。

sentences.english: The spa with gym offers a spacious relaxing environment.
sentences.chinese: 水療中心設有健身室，環境寬敞雅緻。

sentences.english: Hydrotherapy is one method of treating a disease through the use of water.
sentences.chinese: 水療法是一種方法治療疾病，通過水的使用。

sentences.english: SWAN DAY SPA is located in the beautiful historic district of San Dimas.
sentences.chinese: 天鵝日間水療中心坐落在美麗的聖迪馬斯歷史街區。

sentences.english: Connected to the skypool is an ultra-luxury spa and health club.
sentences.chinese: 超豪華的水療中心和健身俱樂部亦在其旁。

sentences.english: Hydrotherapy is one of the most effective methods for preventing and treating cellulite.
sentences.chinese: 水療是其中一個最有效的方法預防和治療脂肪。

sentences.english: She dropped the water treatment and everything else, and pinned her faith to Pain-killer .
sentences.chinese: 她丟下水療法和別的，一心把希望寄託在這止痛藥上。

sentences.english: Before starting your treatment I will give you're a Floral Foot Bath.
sentences.chinese: 在開始水療之前，我會給您先來個植物香足浴。

sentences.english: Gavin and Sonya are spending a day at a spa .
sentences.chinese: 蓋文和桑雅要一起到水療中心待上一天。

sentences.english: Trencianske Teplice has a character of purely spa town.
sentences.chinese: 特倫欽溫泉區是一個純粹的水療城鎮。

definition: variant of 紓壓|纾压[shu1 ya1]
variant of 帕塔亞|帕塔亚[Pa4 ta3 ya4]/Pattaya or Phatthaya city in Chon Buri province of east Thailand

pinyin: Xin1 Ka1 li3 duo1 ni2 ya4

definition: guests feel at home (in a hotel, guest house etc)/a home away from home
Mission Hills Group (Chinese hospitality, sports and leisure company)
